thread.title: Isaiah Thomas fuels Celtics trade rumors with emoji tweet
thread.title_full: Isaiah Thomas fuels Celtics trade rumors with emoji tweet

title: Isaiah Thomas fuels Celtics trade rumors with emoji tweet
text:
Isaiah Thomas fuels Celtics trade rumors with emoji tweet Isaiah Thomas single-handedly drove Celtics fans crazy on Monday night Post to Facebook Isaiah Thomas fuels Celtics trade rumors with emoji tweet Isaiah Thomas single-handedly drove Celtics fans crazy on Monday night  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/isaiah-thomas-emoji-tweet-trade-rumors-nba-deadline-jimmy-butler-carmelo-anthony-boston-chicago-bulls/   Join the Nation's Conversation   Isaiah Thomas fuels Celtics trade rumors with emoji tweet Andrew Joseph Published 9:53 p.m. ET Feb. 20, 2017 | Updated 10 minutes ago 
(Photo: AP) 
We'll always remember the great NBA emoji war of 2015 when DeAndre Jordan's free agency sent the NBA world into madness. 
With that in mind, Isaiah Thomas single-handedly drove Celtics fans crazy on Monday night. Presumably upon hearing reports of the Celtics' potential interest in trading for Jimmy Butler , the All-Star guard posted this tweet. ðŸ‘€ â€” Isaiah Thomas (@Isaiah_Thomas) February 21, 2017 
Oh, Isaiah. He had to know this would happen. A look at his mentions revealed exactly what this tweet did to Celtics nation.
